TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit TextSimpleMarkerProperties extends System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextMarkerProperties

Docs.summary: Provides for a generic implementation of text marker properties.

remarks.format:
## Remarks A text marker is a symbol that is commonly used for bullets and auto-numbering. The following example shows all the different representations of a <xref:System.Windows.TextMarkerStyle>.
When you create a <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextSimpleMarkerProperties> object, you can create a custom text marker that is associated with an enumerated value of <xref:System.Windows.TextMarkerStyle>.

MemberSignature.Value: public TextSimpleMarkerProperties (System.Windows.TextMarkerStyle style, double offset, int autoNumberingIndex, System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextParagraphProperties textParagraphProperties);

Public Sub New (style As TextMarkerStyle, offset As Double, autoNumberingIndex As Integer, textParagraphProperties As TextParagraphProperties)

public: TextSimpleMarkerProperties(System::Windows::TextMarkerStyle style, double offset, int autoNumberingIndex, System::Windows::Media::TextFormatting::TextParagraphProperties ^ textParagraphProperties);

Docs.param: A that represents the distance from the start of the line to the end of the text marker symbol.
An value that represents the auto-numbering counter of counter-style text marker.
A value that represents the properties shared by every text character of the text marker.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
